metadata.title: CVE-2017-17459 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: http_transport.c in Fossil before 2.4, when the SSH sync protocol is used,allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via anssh URL with an initial dash character in the hostname, a related issue toCVE-2017-9800, CVE-2017-12836, CVE-2017-12976, CVE-2017-14176,CVE-2017-16228, CVE-2017-1000116, and CVE-2017-1000117.

criterions.comment: fossil: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
